GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.14 to before v4.14.298
GSD.description:
ALSA: ac97: fix possible memory leak in snd_ac97_dev_register()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.298 by commit 0f8e9a15c8ecf95057061d370a2dddaf1cee4aeb, it was introduced in version v2.6.14 by commit 0ca06a00e206b963587ac471e6d1c52bf33b9a18. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: ac97: fix possible memory leak in snd_ac97_dev_register()
